subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Will Power set an IndyCar Series record with his eighth pole this season, breaking Helio Castroneves’s 2007 record by turning in the fastest time in qualifying for Sunday’s race at Infineon Raceway in Sonoma, Calif.
snippet: Will Power set an IndyCar Series record with his eighth pole this season, breaking Helio Castroneves’s 2007 record by turning in the fastest time in qualifying for Sunday’s race at Infineon Raceway in Sonoma, Calif.
